name: Tools
tagline: Here are some Tools to make work easier
body:
###Tools
Welcome to my Webpage, presenting some useful tools for working with Mac OS
1. Hmi
2. Tree

Hmi (or how_many_items) is a small python script returning the number of items in your directory
Tree is self-made, somewhat equivalent to the Windows/Linux tree command
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
